references.paper_title: Switchboard: Telephone speech corpus for research and development
references.reason: It defines an important early dataset for spoken language processing, and this dataset is used as an inspiration to the one used in the study.
It introduces the concept of "basic emotions", which the study uses as part of its benchmark and which are essential in the multimodal language analysis task considered in the study.

references.paper_title: Multibench: Multiscale benchmarks for multimodal representation learning
references.reason: It constitutes relevant work on building multimodal benchmarks which the current study builds upon; this paper is used for comparison purposes.

references.paper_title: MELD: A multimodal multi-party dataset for emotion recognition in conversations
references.reason: It introduces an important multimodal dataset and is used in the current study as an evaluation task.

references.paper_title: Mosi: multimodal corpus of sentiment intensity and subjectivity analysis in online opinion videos
references.reason: It introduces an important multimodal dataset related to sentiment analysis which the current study uses for comparison.
